title: Was a Newly-Discovered Species of Amphibian Given the Name ‘Dermophis Donaldtrumpi’?
subtitle: Reports in December 2018 referred to a recently discovered "blind creature that buries its head in the sand."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A newly discovered species of amphibian was named "Dermophis donaldtrumpi" as an unflattering reference to the U.S. President.
